page.title: 08Industry:Central Hadleigh
page.content:
POUND LANE is just off Hadleigh High Street. There are:- Vaughan Carpets- they store carpets and distribute them all over East Anglia; Anglian Tarpaulins- swimming pool covers and lorry covers; Brett Fanfare- furniture distributers; Spar U.K.- they make masts from 10ft.to 50ft. and distribute them all over the world. Off ANGEL STREET :- Golden Pride - a packing factory; Boulton and Hawker Ltd.- a film company. STATION ROAD :- Citadel Press; Wilsons - Corn Merchants who use the old Hadleigh Station buildings and who store grain for the Common Market.
(The main industrial estate is just outside our block.)
